reviewtext: Graffitti's ease is definitely over-rated. Graffiti is not that easy to use.  I am definitely thinking of getting the keyboard to type in the huge amount of data (addresses and such) I need to reference.  Also a downside  not really mobile like the Palm V.  This was my first outing with Palm  after being paper and pen for years, and I would say that the Palm is  really worthwile if you travel, if you have a lot of contacts, and if you  are going to use it.
